learnpress-assignments.name: LearnPress - Assignments
learnpress-assignments.description: Assignment Add-on for LearnPress is a great way to assign tasks, essays for your students so they can do at home and submit. Instructors can check students’ work after that and grade the assignment.

learnpress-h5p.name: LearnPress - H5P
learnpress-h5p.description: H5P add-on for LearnPress is to integrate the questions from plugin H5P to the LearnPress system.

learnpress-prerequisites-courses.name: LearnPress – Prerequisites Courses
learnpress-prerequisites-courses.description: LearnPress Prerequisites is an add-on for LearnPress allow you to set prerequisite courses for a certain course in a LearnPress site.
